jobs.title: Paid CDL Training, Job Placement with Swift Refrigerated
jobs.description:
Truck Drivers: Receive Paid Training for Recent CDL Grads
& Job Placement with Swift! Call now for details!

Have you graduated with your Class-A CDL License but lack the EXPERIENCE to land a refrigerated truck driver job? Begin your journey with Swift Refrigerated, and gain the experience you need to break into the industry. Swift's certified mentors are ready to provide you with outstanding paid training to grow you into a confident and professional truck reefer driver at Swift! When you join one of the fastest growing industries in the U.S. (transportation) and become a Swift Refrigerated Driver - you are joining the largest North American fleet carrier in the U.S.!

YOU WILL BE MENTORED BY A SWIFT PRO TO ENSURE YOUR SUCCESS!
Recent CDL Grads will spend between 200 and 300 hours behind the wheel on a mentor's truck hauling loads, delivering freight, and taking care of customers' needs. You will learn from the best, bringing you one step closer to a successful career in trucking. Best part? Paid Training. You will be earning good money while you learn from a Swift Refrigerated Mentor.

At Swift Refrigerated you are more than just a driver, you are family. That's why we have a proud culture of supporting Every Driver, Every Mile, Every Day. Swift has more options for your driving career than any other carrier! We transport a variety of freight from retail to industrial materials-the majority of which is no touch and drop & hook. You can Drive Routes for Convention Services, Container, Dedicated, Flatbed, Heavy Haul, Intermodal, Refrigerated and Dry Van. Earn Great Starting Pay that grows as you drive more miles. Why drive old rigs when you can drive Modern Equipment and Haul Consistent Freight? With Swift Refrigerated you Receive Full Benefits, Paid Vacation, Home Time, and a Career Path you can truly meet! Call now!

ARE YOU A RECENT CDL GRADUATE?
JOIN SWIFT REFRIGERATED & BE PART OF THE SWIFT FAMILY!
Call us @ (866) 881-8698 or Click Here To Apply.


SWIFT ACADEMY: We Train You.
  • New Classes Start Weekly!
  • Tuition Reimbursement Program
  • Tuition Scholarships
  • Veterans Scholarship Program
  • Job Placement with Swift Refrigerated & Swift Transportation!
  • Paid CDL Training for Recent CDL Graduates
    (200-300 hours behind the wheel with a Swift Mentor while you earn good pay)

EXCELLENT BENEFITS:
  • No Contracts! No Gimmicks! No Run Around!
  • Medical plans
  • Prescription drug plans
  • Dental plan
  • Vision plan
  • 401k
  • Paid Vacation
  • Late model equipment
  • Employee assistance program
  • Employee stock purchase program
  • Paid Weekly
  • Work/Life Balance - (home time varies based on routes)

SUPPLEMENTAL BENEFITS:
  • Disability
  • Life
  • Group accident
  • Critical illness
  • Great career paths & more options than any other carrier!

JOB ELIGIBILITY:
  • Be 21 years or older
  • Have a good driving record in the last 5 years
  • Employment subject to Background Screening
  • Looking for a real career path or simply a long over-due job change!

HOW TO APPLY FOR POSITION:

"There are two types of employees: drivers and driver support!"
- CEO of Swift Transportation

This is so true. It all starts and ends with our drivers because without them, Swift Refrigerated is unable to literally deliver for our customers. If you're looking to get into a career that serves as the backbone of our economy, then give us a shout.

At Swift Refrigerated, we Hire to Retire. This means we are a career destination for drivers, not just another job. We give you the training and support you need to get started, the miles to keep you going and family atmosphere that will make you want to spend your whole career here, start to finish. Join the SWIFT Refrigerated family today!

Apply By Phone:
Call (866) 881-8698 to speak with a Swift Refrigerated Recruiter.

Apply By Web:
Apply online by CLICKING HERE.
